channel.title: Kicking me off
channel.description: ok i got a problem i download noobscape tatemo's source and the client and it works with my computer but when my friend logs on he walks once hes fine but second click it closes the client completely this is a 317 source. what could cause it to do this and what can i do about it he is running windows 7 64 bit. he tried running in compatibility mode and it still didnt work.. he was able to walk once but second time he clicked it closed completely!! please help!! [br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 02, 2009, 04:40:13 pm[/size][hr]helps?! ANY IDEAS PLZZ

item.title: Kicking me off

nope its not… fixed still is closing it out on him

item.title: Kicking me off
item.dc:creator: @Fluffee Fluffee
item.description:
@Fluffee wrote:

brendonpenwell:

ehh compatibility mode would have fixed it

In your thread you said that compatibility mode doesn’t work for him. So does that mean his problem is fixed or not?

Fluffee

item.title: Kicking me off
item.dc:creator: @Fluffee Fluffee
item.description:
@Fluffee wrote:

It may be a problem with Windows 7. Tell him to try to use your client on another computer - if he has one. If your client works on another computer, then something may be wrong with game-play on Windows 7. Or - you can tell him to try to login to another server, if it works for him fine - then it’s most likely to be your client’s problem.

Fluffee

Read full topic
